answers.answer: This is a forum about alcoholism- I think you may be in the wrong place.  Click on forums here and look at the full list- you can find quite a few that give medical advice.

question: Sex: FemaleBirthdate: 6/13/40                  Age: 68 yearsHeight: 5 ft. 5in                       Weight: 145 lbsBlood Pressure: 130/95           Heart Rate: 74 beats/ minPatient Medical History:-takes ibuprofen daily for headaches-has adult onset diabetes-has had high blood pressure since age 40Symptoms:-patient complains of feeling weak and tired-patient has sweelling in her hands, feets and legspatient feels short of breath and is breathing rapidlyOther Exams/Test:-blood test indicates that there is a build up of waste product in the blood-urine test indicatess high levels of protein
title: Which dease do i have?
